articles.title: RFK Jr. Cancels Promising Work on Cancer Vaccine - Futurism
articles.description: Robert F. Kennedy, Jr. is abandoning a massive American asset by canceling research into mRNA vaccines, which will soon cover cancer.
articles.content: About 10 weeks before his assassination in 1968, Robert F. Kennedy  better known as Bobby, and the father of our current health secretary, Robert F. Kennedy, Jr. delivered a rousing address at Vander… [+3983 chars]
